mapper.select: SELECT WEATHER_DATE AS weatherDate, WEATHER_TIME AS weatherTime, WEATHER_TYPE AS weatherType, TEMPERATURE AS temperature, HUMIDITY AS humidity, ATMOSPHERIC_PRESSURE AS atmosphericPressure, WIND_SPEED AS windSpeed, WIND_DIRECTION AS windDirection, LATITUDE AS latitude, LONGITUDE AS longitude, CREATED_AT AS createdAt, CREATED_BY AS createdBy FROM HISTORY_WEATHER WHERE 1=1 AND WEATHER_DATE = #{weatherDate} AND WEATHER_TIME = #{weatherTime} ORDER BY WEATHER_DATE, WEATHER_TIME DESC LIMIT 1
